title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\Message
name: Message
description:
Represents a message posted into a conversation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Message

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Optional. The unique identifier of the message. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>/messages/<Message ID>.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Optional. The message language. This should be a BCP-47 language tag. Example: "en-US".

params.name: data.participant
params.description: Output only. The participant that sends this message.

params.name: data.participant_role
params.description: Output only. The role of the participant.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The time when the message was created in Contact Center AI.

params.name: data.send_time
params.description: Optional. The time when the message was sent.

params.name: data.message_annotation
params.description: Output only. The annotation for the message.

params.name: data.sentiment_analysis
params.description: Output only. The sentiment analysis result for the message.
